channel.title: Comments on: Maybe this is common knowledge but you can jump really, really high on the diving board on Miami.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: DesDaMOONmanQ
item.dc:creator: DesDaMOONmanQ
item.description: Did not know that. But I probably haven't played that map in over 6 months lol
item.content:encoded: Did not know that. But I probably haven’t played that map in over 6 months lol

item.title: By: BigPoppies
item.dc:creator: BigPoppies
item.description: This clip really is the state of cod lol. Try to have fun and show off something cool and you die immediately.
item.content:encoded: This clip really is the state of cod lol. Try to have fun and show off something cool and you die immediately.

item.title: By: nostradamuslegend

item.description: Its funny when you shoot someone in the room on the second floor, they’re usually pretty surprised

item.title: By: T-MONZ_GCU
item.dc:creator: T-MONZ_GCU
item.description: I wish the Miami strike map was more based around the hotel with the pool and beach and stuff instead of the weird parking garage area
item.content:encoded: I wish the Miami strike map was more based around the hotel with the pool and beach and stuff instead of the weird parking garage area
